name: A Mini Godzilla Escape Shooter Wars
name_original: A Mini Godzilla Escape Shooter Wars
description:
Are you searching for a fast-paced game that's exciting and fun? Do you love a lot of the classic arcade and video games? If so, then this game will be right up your alley!

There are objects falling all around you and it's up to you to get out of their way. Be quick and dodge them and don't let them crash land on you or else your game is over. You've got to be quick and pay attention if you want the game to keep going!

As the levels increase, the game just gets more exhilarating! The stimulating graphics and rapid speed of the game will keep you on your toes as you move from side to side and escape the things that would have you start all over again.

You love to play games that challenge you and keep you moving. This game won't disappoint!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
